## Description

Get the language runtimes for a content item.

::: {.panel-tabset group="language"}

## Python

```{python}
from posit import connect

client = connect.Client()

item = client.content.find_one()

print(item.py_version)
print(item.quarto_version)
print(item.r_version)
```
